title: Back to Work (with Tom Brake MP)
itunes:title: Back to Work (with Tom Brake MP)
description:
As MPs return to parliament, Tom Brake, Liberal Democrat MP and Brexit spokesperson, says the priority for his party remains getting a no-deal Brexit off the table. Speaking to Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek, Brake says the Liberal Democrats are exploring ways to force the prime minister to ask for a Brexit extension sooner.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
